turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm looking to order a drink from the Starbucks on Walnut Street in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me pull that starbucks up. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am going to get the caramel macchiato tall, please, with non-fat milk and whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so the order is for 1 tall iced caramel macchiato with nonfat milk and whipped cream on top from the starbucks from walnut street in philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, go ahead and order that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted the order. it'll b ready for pick up in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, enjoy the drink. you're welcome.
